participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and caring, enjoys being around animals and people.
participant_1.background: i've three dogs. i like to watch the olympics. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business. my father was a door to door salesman.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Reserved and introspective, often reflecting on life's challenges.
participant_2.background: my wife left me and took my children. i don't believe in god. i'm overweight and unhappy. i work at a nursing home. i spend most of my time on facebook when i'm not working.
